Lucy Dacus — Forever is a Feeling 

[“You’ve got style / no one’s doin’ it like you are”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j8Hudcruuwg)

# Seven 

Dave Malloy — Three Houses

# Five 

Viagra Boys — viagr aboys

# Four 

Geese — Getting Killed

# Three 

Kicksie -- BIG SUCKER

# Two 

Jeffrey Lewis and the Voltage — EVEN MORE Freewheelin’ Jeffrey Lewis

[“But what’s inside of me / is basically gravity / a meaningless cavity / a bottomless hole / all the lazy sensations / easy gratifications / the corruption and gluttony / and sugar and fat / the me that I’d follow / is just shallow and hollow / to just me a natural me / will only me that”](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jPK8l2DIkZg)

# One 

Saintseneca — Highwallow and Supermoon Songs
